trainsRunningAll: As of {time}, all trains are running normally on the {MBTA}.
trainsRunningSome: As of {time}, some trains are not running on the {MBTA}.
trainsRunningAllSubway: As of {time}, all subway trains are running normally on the {MBTA}.
trainsRunningSomeSubway: As of {time}, some subway trains are not running on the {MBTA}.
trainsRunningAllCr: As of {time}, all commuter rail trains are running normally on the {MBTA}.
trainsRunningSomeCr: As of {time}, some commuter rail trains are not running on the {MBTA}.
noDowntownTransferDescription: Last train time is later for some stops and directions. Downtown subway transfer is not guaranteed after {time}. Last trains on some lines will leave transfer stations by then.
importantNotesServiceDayEnd: For night owls, dates above reflect MBTA service days which end at {hour}:59am.
calendarDayNoAlerts: No service alerts on the day
errorSeeAlso: Sorry, something went wrong. You may also check the latest alerts on the {MBTA}.
aboutDescriptionOne: notrains.today is a free and open-source web application that provides simple interface for service alerts information on the MBTA transit system in the Greater Boston area, in today view and calendar view.
aboutDescriptionTwo: This app is not affiliated with the MBTA, but uses data service from the MBTA/MassDOT.
aboutDescriptionContact: The easiest way to contact the developer is to use the {feedback} button at the page bottom.
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolNight: The service will be affected later in the evening
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolRedNorthOfH: Stations from Alewife to Harvard are affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolRedNorthbou: All Cambridge and Boston downtown stations are affected down to JFK/UMass
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolRedAshmontB: Ashmont to JFK/UMass branch is affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolRedBraintre: Braintree to JFK/UMass branch is affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolRedBothSout: Both Ashmont and Braintree branches to JFK/UMass are affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolOrangeNorth: Stations from Oak Grove to North Station are affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolOrangeSouth: Stations from Forest Hill to Back Bay are affected
Stations from Forest Hill to North Station including Boston downtown stations are affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolBlueDowntow: Bowdoin to East Boston Harbor stations including Boston downtown stations are affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolGreenNorthO: Stations from Government Center to northbound stations (Medford/Tufts and Union Square) across the Charles River are affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolGreenGLX: Stations north of North Station up to Medford/Tufts or Union Square are affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolGreenGLXD: Stations north of North Station up to Union Square are affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolGreenGLXE: Stations north of North Station up to Medford/Tufts are affected
mbtaAlertBadgeSecondarySymbolNorthIntoBo: Suburbs near Boston and North Station are affected
